entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montmagny
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:35 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending overnight then clearing. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
